org.fujion.highcharts

Class PlotBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.highcharts.PlotOptions
        • org.fujion.highcharts.PlotBullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionMapTransform, IClientTransform

    public class PlotBullet
extends PlotOptions
    Options for bullet graph.

    A bullet graph is a variation of a bar graph. The bullet graph features a single measure, compares it to a target, and displays it in the context of qualitative ranges of performance that could be set using plotBands on yAxis.

    • Field Detail

      • depth

        @Option
public Integer depth
        Depth of the columns in a 3D column chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js. Defaults to 25.

      • edgeColor

        @Option
public String edgeColor
        3D columns only. The color of the edges. Similar to borderColor, except it defaults to the same color as the column. Defaults to undefined.

      • edgeWidth

        @Option
public Integer edgeWidth
        3D columns only. The width of the colored edges. Defaults to 1.

      • grouping

        @Option
public Boolean grouping
        Whether to group non-stacked columns or to let them render independent of each other. Non-grouped columns will be laid out individually and overlap each other. Defaults to true.

      • groupingZPadding

        @Option
public Integer groupingZPadding
        The spacing between columns on the Z Axis in a 3D chart. Requires highcharts-3d.js. Defaults to 1.

      • maxPointWidth

        @Option
public Integer maxPointWidth
        The maximum allowed pixel width for a column, translated to the height of a bar in a bar chart. This prevents the columns from becoming too wide when there is a small number of points in the chart. Defaults to null.

      • pointWidth

        @Option
public Integer pointWidth
        A pixel value specifying a fixed width for each column or bar. When null, the width is calculated from the pointPadding and groupPadding. Defaults to null.

      • targetOptions_borderWidth

        @Option(value="targetOptions.borderWidth")
public Integer targetOptions_borderWidth
        The border width of the rectangle representing the target. In styled mode, use class highcharts-bullet-target instead. Defaults to 0.

      • targetOptions_height

        @Option(value="targetOptions.height")
public Integer targetOptions_height
        The height of the rectangle representing the target. Defaults to 3.

      • targetOptions_width

        @Option(value="targetOptions.width")
public String targetOptions_width
        The width of the rectangle representing the target. Could be set as a pixel value or as a percentage of a column width. Defaults to 140%.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlotBullet

        public PlotBullet()
